in ancient Japanese folktales , monkeys often appear as tricksters , cleverly duping other animals out of their rice ball or persimmon fruit .在古老的日本民间故事里，猴子往往扮演爱恶作剧的妖精，狡狯地骗走其它动物的饭团或柿子。
